korean: 아침에 일어났는데 눈이 퉁퉁 부어있어서 놀랐어.
콧물이 계속 나고 눈도 가려워서 힘들어.
재채기도 엄청 나와서 사람들이 다 쳐다봤다.
알레르기 약을 먹었지만 완전히 낫지는 않는다.
눈 비비면 더 심해진다는 거 알면서도 너무 가려워서 자꾸 비비게 돼.
밖에 나갈 때 마스크 쓰고 선글라스까지 껴야 해.
화분 날리는 거 보면 진짜 짜증나.
친구는 봄이 좋다는데 나한텐 그냥 고문이야.
한 달만 더 참으면 좀 나아지려나.
매년 이맘때면 이러는데 진짜 익숙해지질 않아.
english: With spring arriving, my pollen allergies started.
I woke up this morning and my eyes were, like, super swollen. It was shocking.
My nose keeps running and my eyes are itchy, it's tough.
I was sneezing so much that people kept staring at me.
I took allergy medicine, but it's not completely better.
I know rubbing my eyes makes it worse, but they're so itchy I can't help it.
When I go outside, I have to wear a mask and even sunglasses.
Seeing all that pollen flying around honestly just pisses me off.
My friend says they love spring, but for me it's just torture.
I hope this season passes quickly.
Maybe if I can just hold out for another month, it'll get better.
I go through this every year at this time, but I never get used to it.
